enumerations.name: ModeErrorReactionPolicyEnum
enumerations.note: This represents the ability to specify the reaction on a mode error. Aggregated by ModeErrorBehavior.errorReactionPolicy

literals.name: defaultMode
literals.description:
This represents the ability to switch to the defaultMode in case of a mode error.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: lastMode
literals.description:
This represents the ability to keep the last mode in case of a mode error.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

enumerations.name: ModeActivationKind
enumerations.note: Kind of mode switch condition used for activation of an event, as further described for each enumeration field. Aggregated by BswModeSwitchEvent.activation, SwcModeSwitchEvent.activation

literals.name: onEntry
literals.description:
On entering the referred mode.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: onExit
literals.description:
On exiting the referred mode.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: onTransition
literals.description:
On transition of the 1st referred mode to the 2nd referred mode.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2
